attributes.action: Stop the MOD scrapping vital electronic letter links to uk's frontline troups!!!
attributes.additional_details: Quite frankly this service was totally priceless when our son served in Afghanistan in 2011as soldiers are not always near to base and access to wi-fi and social media should not be used on operations for security reasons!!
attributes.background: The ministry of defence plan to abandon the online letter service known as E-blueys to save £1 million! we respectfully request a rethink of this much cherished service which allows our loved one's in service to have contact with their families whilst serving on the frontline!!
